abstract: It’s no surprise that Warren E. Buffett can command enviable terms when it comes to bank loans. That’s the case with the $8 billion loan he is borrowing to take over the rest of railroad operator Burlington Northern for $26 billion.

headline.main: Buffett Cuts Sweet Deal for Burlington Northern Loan
